        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_meteor_hammer_lua1"                           "Meteor Hammer"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_meteor_hammer_lua1_Description"               "<h1>Active: Meteor Hammer</h1> INTERRUPTIBLE ‚Äî summons a meteorite, which after a short delay hits the area with a radius of %impact_radius%. The strike deals damage to enemy creatures and buildings, stuns them for %stun_duration% seconds and sets them on fire, dealing periodic damage for %burn_duration% seconds.<BR><BR>Damage to buildings on impact: %impact_damage_buildings% <BR>Periodic damage to buildings: %burn_dps_buildings% <BR><BR>Units damage on impact: %impact_damage_units% <BR>Periodic damage to units: %burn_dps_units% <BR><BR>Cast time: %max_duration% sec.<BR>Delay after cast: %land_time%sec."

Deals %cleave_damage_percent_creep%%% against creeps. (Melee Only) <br> <font color='#b000cf'> Working in conjunction with the Desolator reduces the armor of non-primary targets by 50% of the Desolator.</font>"

Deals %cleave_damage_percent_creep%%% against creeps. (Melee Only) <br> <font color='#b000cf'> Working in conjunction with the Desolator reduces the armor of non-primary targets by 50% of the Desolator.</font>"

(Melee Only) <br> <font color='#b000cf'> Working in conjunction with the Desolator reduces the armor of non-primary targets by 50% of the Desolator.</font>"

        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1" "Ethereal Blade"
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_description" "<h1>Active: Ether Blast</h1>Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for %duration_ally% seconds on allies and %duration% seconds on enemies.<br><br> Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your primary attribute +%blast_damage_base% as magical damage.<br><br>Range: %abilitycastrange%"
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_note0" "Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter."
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_note1" "Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage."
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_note2" "Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast."
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_note3" "Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form."
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_bonus_agility" "+$agi"
        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade_lua1_bonus_strength" "+$str"

Lightning proc pierces evasion."

        "dota_tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_lua1_note1" "Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than %static_seconary_radius% range away."
